name: Nitro
description: Create web servers that run anywhere.
shortDescription: Create web servers that run anywhere.

landing.heroCode:
npx giget@latest nitro
cd nitro-app
npm install
npm run dev

features.title: Rapid Development
features.description: Zero config setup with hot module replacement for server code in development.

features.title: Deploy Anywhere
features.description: Deploy the same codebase to any [deployment provider](/deploy) with no extra config.

features.title: Portable and Compact
features.description: Say goodbye to `node_modules`, output size is less than 1MB.

features.title: Minimal Design
features.description: Minimal design to fit into any solution with minimum overhead

features.title: Code-Splitting
features.description: Async chunk loading for fast server startup time and answer.

features.title: TypeScript
features.description: TypeScript support out of the box with few more goodies.

features.title: Storage Layer
features.description: Multi driver and platform-agnostic storage system.

features.title: Hackable
features.description: Built to be customized with the [plugins](/guide/plugins) hooks system.

features.title: Auto Imports
features.description: Automatically import utilities for a minimal and clean codebase. Only the used ones will be added to the final bundle.

features.title: Backward Compatible
features.description: So you can use legacy npm packages, CommonJS and mocking Node.js modules for workers.
